summary: retexture LeatherBound Huntress Armour by Shadowtroop and DeannaRose24
descriptionHtml:
title says everything.. it has its own esp and meshes/texture path so it won\'t overwrite d original, however i reduced d texture to 1024 and only retext d brown one (2048 really hit my performance)

d stats and recipes r based on StuddedArmor (require BasicSmithing) i also include \'hidden hood\' for those who doesn\'t like wearing helmet/hood

if ur color doesn\'t match my screenshot then it\'s likely because:
- it was shot at Riften around 9 PM
- i use RCRN Legacy w/ RCRN-FXAA OFF and my setting on injFX_Setting.h are:
..
#define USE_HDR 0
..
#define Gamma 1.380
..
float Sharpen = 0.06;
..

 iNSTALL
- just copy meshes, texture and HuntressAlt.esp to ..\\data folder
- if u\'d like a \'hidden hood\' use HuntressAlt.esp from \'optional_HiddenHood\' folder instead


 HiSTORY
1.0a
- fix no texture issues and optimizing NIF
- add Advanced Huntress Armor w/ ScaledArmor BaseStats, require AdvancedArmorPerk, SabreCatPelt, Refined Moonstone and Huntress \'Basic\' Armor
1.0 - initial release

used by permission..
all CREDITS goes to Shadowtroop
Original - http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=11143

 NOTEs
if u like this mode please endorsed d original (link above) or give Shadowtroop a Kudos as he\'s an original creator.. i\'m just messing around, really!

AdvHuntressArmors is based on More Advanced LightArmors
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=15543

 THANKs
Shadowtroop, Nexus, TESVSnip, Nifskope,  GiMP and Photoshop-NormalMapPlugins..
author: fREAkX
